import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar'; import Header from '../../components/header/Header'; import "./list.css"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import {format} from "date-fns"; import DateRange from "react-date-range/dist/components/DateRange"; const List = () =>{ const location = useLocation(); console.log(location); const [destination, setDestination] = useState(location.state.destination); const [date, setDate] = useState(location.state.date); const [openDate, setOpenDate] = useState(false); const [options, setoptions] = useState(location.state.options); return(

setOpenDate(!openDate)}>{`${format(date[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format(date[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")}`} {openDate&&(setDate([item.selection])} minDate={new Date()} ranges={date} />)}
